page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart definition layer object

discussion.p: A chart is drawn based on a set of one or more layers. Each chart type has its own layer settings. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Layer Object - Rect Object]*, *[link:A5.chart Definition Layer Object - Linear Object]*, *[link:A5.chart Definition Layer Object - Polar Object]*, *[link:A5.chart Definition Layer Object - Radial Object]*
